item.title: Wanted: Effectively-Once Processing in Azure
item.description: This experimental post is a question. The question is too broad for StackOverflow, so I’m posting it here. Please engage in the comments section, or forward the link to subject experts.

item.title: Introducing Stream Processing in F#
item.description:
The post was published for F# Advent Calendar 2016, thus the examples are themed around the Christmas gifts.

This article is my naive introduction to the data processing discipline called Stream Processing.
